entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Snow level 600 metres. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 21 April 2023
